resources.string:
Tagin In-place Benchmarking 
 
 Inplace benchmarking is a part of series of benchmarking tools which will help to determine the various thresholds to simplify the process of URN generation by the Tagin! Engine. Specifically The purpose of in-place benchmarking is to help characterize the background noise present during fingerprinting. 
 

You can read more about it from here.

How To

Click Start Logging to start the Logging Process.

A dialog box will help you to monitor the logging process. 

You can toggle between Moving and In place by clicking the toggle button. 

Click Stop to turn off the logging process

You can browse the complete log at taginLog.txt in sdcard.
